name: OsLoginServiceClient
title: Google
Cloud
OsLogin
V1beta
OsLoginServiceClient
description:
Cloud OS Login API

The Cloud OS Login API allows you to manage users and their associated SSH public keys for logging into virtual machines on Google Cloud Platform.

methods.name: user_path
title: Google
Cloud
OsLogin
V1beta
OsLoginServiceClient.user_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified user resource name string.

methods.name: project_path
title: Google
Cloud
OsLogin
V1beta
OsLoginServiceClient.project_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified project resource name string.

methods.name: fingerprint_path
title: Google
Cloud
OsLogin
V1beta
OsLoginServiceClient.fingerprint_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified fingerprint resource name string.

params.name: credentials
params.description: Provides the means for authenticating requests made by the client. This parameter can be many types. A Google::Auth::Credentials uses a the properties of its represented keyfile for authenticating requests made by this client. A String will be treated as the path to the keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A Hash will be treated as the contents of a keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A GRPC::Core::Channel will be used to make calls through. A GRPC::Core::ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client. The channel credentials should already be composed with a GRPC::Core::CallCredentials object. A Proc will be used as an updater_proc for the Grpc channel. The proc transforms the metadata for requests, generally, to give OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

params.name: name
params.description:
A reference to the POSIX account to update. POSIX accounts are identified
by the project ID they are associated with. A reference to the POSIX
account is in format +users/user/projects/project+.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: name
params.description:
The fingerprint of the public key to update. Public keys are identified by
their SHA-256 fingerprint. The fingerprint of the public key is in format
+users/user/sshPublicKeys/fingerprint+.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: get_login_profile
title: Google
Cloud
OsLogin
V1beta
OsLoginServiceClient#get_login_profile
methods.description: Retrieves the profile information used for logging in to a virtual machine on Google Compute Engine.

params.name: name
params.description: The unique ID for the user in format +users/user+.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: name
params.description:
The fingerprint of the public key to retrieve. Public keys are identified
by their SHA-256 fingerprint. The fingerprint of the public key is in
format +users/user/sshPublicKeys/fingerprint+.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: import_ssh_public_key
title: Google
Cloud
OsLogin
V1beta
OsLoginServiceClient#import_ssh_public_key
methods.description: Adds an SSH public key and returns the profile information. Default POSIX account information is set when no username and UID exist as part of the login profile.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/os_login/v1beta"

os_login_service_client = Google::Cloud::OsLogin::V1beta.new
formatted_parent = Google::Cloud::OsLogin::V1beta::OsLoginServiceClient.user_path("[USER]")
ssh_public_key = {}
response = os_login_service_client.import_ssh_public_key(formatted_parent, ssh_public_key)

params.name: parent
params.description: The unique ID for the user in format +users/user+.

params.name: ssh_public_key
params.description: The SSH public key and expiration time. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Oslogin::Common::SshPublicKey can also be provided.

params.name: project_id
params.description: The project ID of the Google Cloud Platform project.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: update_ssh_public_key
title: Google
Cloud
OsLogin
V1beta
OsLoginServiceClient#update_ssh_public_key
methods.description: Updates an SSH public key and returns the profile information. This method supports patch semantics.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/os_login/v1beta"

os_login_service_client = Google::Cloud::OsLogin::V1beta.new
formatted_name = Google::Cloud::OsLogin::V1beta::OsLoginServiceClient.fingerprint_path("[USER]", "[FINGERPRINT]")
ssh_public_key = {}
response = os_login_service_client.update_ssh_public_key(formatted_name, ssh_public_key)

params.name: name
params.description:
The fingerprint of the public key to update. Public keys are identified by
their SHA-256 fingerprint. The fingerprint of the public key is in format
+users/user/sshPublicKeys/fingerprint+.

params.name: ssh_public_key
params.description: The SSH public key and expiration time. A hash of the same form as Google::Cloud::Oslogin::Common::SshPublicKey can also be provided.

params.name: update_mask
params.description: Mask to control which fields get updated. Updates all if not present. A hash of the same form as Google::Protobuf::FieldMask can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
